question: Which part of healthcare are you most curious about?

options.a: Understanding how the human body works inside and out
options.b: Helping people recover and care for their health daily

question: If you had to take care of someone, what would you focus on?

options.a: Checking their vital signs and understanding symptoms
options.b: Assisting with their comfort, hygiene, and medication
options.c: Responding quickly if they had a sudden injury

question: Which kind of learning sounds most interesting to you?

options.a: Learning the names and functions of body organs
options.b: Learning how to care for patients in hospitals
options.c: Learning how to treat burns, wounds, or fainting

question: What role would you feel most confident in?

options.a: Performing health check-ups like pulse and temperature
options.b: Helping with everyday patient care in a clinic
options.c: Being the first responder during an accident

options.a: A lab or classroom studying body systems and organs
options.b: A hospital ward helping care for patients
options.c: An emergency room or at the scene of an accident

options.b: Caring for patients in long-term or daily routines
options.c: Responding fast and effectively in urgent situations

options.b: How nurses help patients feel better and stay healthy
options.c: How to treat injuries until help arrives
